FuncDef: The display dhcp relay command displays configuration information about a DHCP relay agent. The display dhcp relay command displays configuration information about a DHCP relay agent.
CLIs: display dhcp relay { configuration | all | interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> } }

ParaDef.Info:
Displays configuration information about DHCP relay agents configured globally and on all interfaces.
-

Displays configuration information about DHCP relay agents configured on all interfaces.
-

Displays configuration information about a DHCP relay agent configured on a specified interface.
-

Displays configuration information about a DHCP relay agent configured on a specified interface.
-
